name: European Society of Oncology Pharmacy
goal:
The aim of ESOP is to support optimal treatment for cancer patients.

Objectives:
1. to develop and promote clinical and oncology pharmacy practice through:
- education and training
- safe handling and administration of drugs
- quality management
- research and development
- pharmaceutical care
2. To make information on knowledge and achievements in cancer treatment and activities available to the public.
3. To spread the information by publications, professional activities as well as educational lectures an seminars.
interests: Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Public Health, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
- Contamination, research and safe handling support
- We are collecting datas regarding expensive and non expensive drugs for children
- drug shortage
- oral oncologic drugs
